requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Dedicated VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.6GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Dedicated VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

results.name: Adipo City Visual Novel Chapter 2: The Clock Says Eureka, Midori!

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
